name: Social/Community Platforms
intro: Allow quick login through social media accounts.

name: E-commerce Platform
intro: Identity verification for docking with electronic payment systems.

name: Banking/FinTech
intro: Strict compliance requirements, requiring multiple certifications.

name: Payment Gateway
intro: Third party authentication integrated with PCI-DSS standard.

name: Mobile/MMO Games
intro: Log in through other gaming platform accounts.

name: Streaming Media Services
intro: Netflix and other platforms require third-party subscription accounts for authentication.

name: Industrial IoT
intro: Device permissions need to be integrated with the enterprise AD/LDAP system.

name: High Security Scenario
intro: Integrate hardware keys (YubiKey) or biometric services.
